fields.name: accessory_product_ids
fields.help: Accessories show up when the customer reviews the cart before payment (cross-sell strategy).

fields.name: active
fields.help: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.

fields.name: activity_exception_decoration
fields.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

fields.name: activity_exception_icon
fields.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

fields.name: activity_state
fields.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

fields.name: activity_type_icon
fields.help: Font awesome icon e.g. fa-tasks

fields.name: allow_negative_stock
fields.help: If this option is not active on this product nor on its product category and that this product is a stockable product, then the validation of the related stock moves will be blocked if the stock level becomes negative with the stock move.

fields.name: alternative_product_ids
fields.help: Suggest alternatives to your customer (upsell strategy). Those products show up on the product page.

fields.name: barcode
fields.help: International Article Number used for product identification.

fields.name: can_be_expensed
fields.help: Specify whether the product can be selected in an expense.

fields.name: categ_id
fields.help: Select category for the current product

fields.name: cost_method
fields.help:
Standard Price: The products are valued at their standard cost defined on the product.
        Average Cost (AVCO): The products are valued at weighted average cost.
        First In First Out (FIFO): The products are valued supposing those that enter the company first will also leave it first.

fields.name: description_sale
fields.help: A description of the Product that you want to communicate to your customers. This description will be copied to every Sales Order, Delivery Order and Customer Invoice/Credit Note

fields.name: expected_margin
fields.help: Expected Sale - Normal Cost

fields.name: expected_margin_rate
fields.help: Expected margin * 100 / Expected Sale

fields.name: expense_policy
fields.help: Expenses and vendor bills can be re-invoiced to a customer.With this option, a validated expense can be re-invoice to a customer at its cost or sales price.

fields.name: free_qty
fields.help:
Forecast quantity (computed as Quantity On Hand - reserved quantity)
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods stored in this location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods stored in the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods stored in any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

fields.name: has_available_route_ids
fields.field_description: Routes can be selected on this product
fields.string: Routes can be selected on this product

fields.name: hs_code
fields.help: Standardized code for international shipping and goods declaration. At the moment, only used for the FedEx shipping provider.

fields.name: incoming_qty
fields.help:
Quantity of planned incoming products.
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods arriving to this Location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods arriving to the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods arriving to any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

fields.name: inventory_availability
fields.help: Adds an inventory availability status on the web product page.
selection: Show inventory on website and prevent sales if not enough stock
Show inventory below a threshold and prevent sales if not enough stock

fields.name: invoice_policy
fields.help:
Ordered Quantity: Invoice quantities ordered by the customer.
Delivered Quantity: Invoice quantities delivered to the customer.

fields.name: list_price
fields.help: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

fields.name: lst_price
fields.help: The sale price is managed from the product template. Click on the 'Configure Variants' button to set the extra attribute prices.

fields.name: message_has_error
fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

fields.name: message_has_error_counter
fields.help: Number of messages with delivery error

fields.name: message_has_sms_error
fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

fields.name: message_needaction
fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

fields.name: message_needaction_counter
fields.help: Number of messages which requires an action

fields.name: message_unread
fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

fields.name: message_unread_counter
fields.help: Number of unread messages

fields.name: normal_cost
fields.help: Sum of Multiplication of Cost price and quantity of Vendor Bills

fields.name: outgoing_qty
fields.help:
Quantity of planned outgoing products.
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods leaving this Location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods leaving the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods leaving any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

fields.name: packaging_ids
fields.help: Gives the different ways to package the same product.

fields.name: price_extra
fields.help: This is the sum of the extra price of all attributes

fields.name: pricelist_id
fields.help: Technical field. Used for searching on pricelists, not stored in database.

fields.name: produce_delay
fields.help: Average lead time in days to manufacture this product. In the case of multi-level BOM, the manufacturing lead times of the components will be added.

fields.name: project_id
fields.help: Select a billable project on which tasks can be created. This setting must be set for each company.

fields.name: project_template_id
fields.help: Select a billable project to be the skeleton of the new created project when selling the current product. Its stages and tasks will be duplicated.

fields.name: property_account_creditor_price_difference
fields.help: This account is used in automated inventory valuation to record the price difference between a purchase order and its related vendor bill when validating this vendor bill.

fields.name: property_account_expense_id
fields.help: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category. If anglo-saxon accounting with automated valuation method is configured, the expense account on the product category will be used.

fields.name: property_account_income_id
fields.help: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category.

fields.name: property_stock_inventory
fields.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated when you do an inventory.

fields.name: property_stock_production
fields.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated by manufacturing orders.

fields.name: public_categ_ids
fields.help: The product will be available in each mentioned eCommerce category. Go to Shop > Customize and enable 'eCommerce categories' to view all eCommerce categories.

fields.name: purchase_avg_price
fields.help: Avg. Price in Vendor Bills

fields.name: purchase_gap
fields.help: Normal Cost - Total Cost

fields.name: purchase_line_warn
fields.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

fields.name: purchase_method
fields.help:
On ordered quantities: Control bills based on ordered quantities.
On received quantities: Control bills based on received quantities.

fields.name: purchase_num_invoiced
fields.help: Sum of Quantity in Vendor Bills

fields.name: purchase_order_line_ids
fields.help: Technical: used to compute quantities.

fields.name: purchase_requisition
fields.help: Create a draft purchase order: Based on your product configuration, the system will create a draft purchase order.Propose a call for tender : If the 'purchase_requisition' module is installed and this option is selected, the system will create a draft call for tender.

fields.name: qty_available
fields.help:
Current quantity of products.
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods stored at this Location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods stored in the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
stored in the Stock Location of the Warehouse of this Shop, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods stored in any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

fields.name: rating_last_feedback
fields.help: Reason of the rating

fields.name: recurring_invoice
fields.help: If set, confirming a sale order with this product will create a subscription

fields.name: responsible_id
fields.help: This user will be responsible of the next activities related to logistic operations for this product.

fields.name: route_ids
fields.help: Depending on the modules installed, this will allow you to define the route of the product: whether it will be bought, manufactured, replenished on order, etc.

fields.name: sale_avg_price
fields.help: Avg. Price in Customer Invoices.

fields.name: sale_delay
fields.help: Delivery lead time, in days. It's the number of days, promised to the customer, between the confirmation of the sales order and the delivery.

fields.name: sale_expected
fields.help: Sum of Multiplication of Sale Catalog price and quantity of Customer Invoices

fields.name: sale_line_warn
fields.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

fields.name: sale_num_invoiced
fields.help: Sum of Quantity in Customer Invoices

fields.name: sales_gap
fields.help: Expected Sale - Turn Over

fields.name: seller_ids
fields.help: Define vendor pricelists.

fields.name: sequence
fields.help: Gives the sequence order when displaying a product list

fields.name: service_to_purchase
fields.help: If ticked, each time you sell this product through a SO, a RfQ is automatically created to buy the product. Tip: don't forget to set a vendor on the product.

fields.name: service_tracking
fields.help:
On Sales order confirmation, this product can generate a project and/or task.         From those, you can track the service you are selling.
         'In sale order's project': Will use the sale order's configured project if defined or fallback to         creating a new project based on the selected template.
selection: Create a task in an existing project
Create a task in sales order's project
Create a new project but no task

fields.name: service_type
fields.help:
Manually set quantities on order: Invoice based on the manually entered quantity, without creating an analytic account.
Timesheets on contract: Invoice based on the tracked hours on the related timesheet.
Create a task and track hours: Create a task on the sales order validation and track the work hours.
selection: Timesheets on project (one fare per SO/Project)

fields.name: show_on_hand_qty_status_button
fields.field_description: Show On Hand Qty Status Button
fields.string: Show On Hand Qty Status Button

fields.name: standard_price
fields.help:
In Standard Price & AVCO: value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        In FIFO: value of the next unit that will leave the stock (automatically computed).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.

fields.name: stock_move_ids
fields.help: Technical: used to compute quantities.

fields.name: stock_quant_ids
fields.help: Technical: used to compute quantities.

fields.name: subscription_template_id
fields.help: Product will be included in a selected template

fields.name: supplier_taxes_id
fields.help: Default taxes used when buying the product.

fields.name: taxes_id
fields.help: Default taxes used when selling the product.

fields.name: total_cost
fields.help: Sum of Multiplication of Invoice price and quantity of Vendor Bills

fields.name: total_margin
fields.help: Turnover - Standard price

fields.name: total_margin_rate
fields.help: Total margin * 100 / Turnover

fields.name: tracking
fields.help: Ensure the traceability of a storable product in your warehouse.

fields.name: turnover
fields.help: Sum of Multiplication of Invoice price and quantity of Customer Invoices

fields.name: type
fields.help:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

fields.name: uom_id
fields.help: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.

fields.name: uom_po_id
fields.help: Default unit of measure used for purchase orders. It must be in the same category as the default unit of measure.

fields.name: valid_product_template_attribute_line_ids
fields.help: Technical compute

fields.name: valuation
fields.help:
Manual: The accounting entries to value the inventory are not posted automatically.
        Automated: An accounting entry is automatically created to value the inventory when a product enters or leaves the company.

fields.name: virtual_available
fields.help:
Forecast quantity (computed as Quantity On Hand - Outgoing + Incoming)
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods stored in this location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods stored in the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods stored in any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

fields.name: website_id
fields.help: Restrict publishing to this website.

fields.name: website_message_ids
fields.help: Website communication history

fields.name: website_sequence
fields.help: Determine the display order in the Website E-commerce

fields.name: website_url
fields.help: The full URL to access the document through the website.

constraints.name: product_product_barcode_uniq
constraints.message: A barcode can only be assigned to one product !

required_fields.name: categ_id
required_fields.help: Select category for the current product

required_fields.help: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.

special_rules.variants_import:
product.product adalah varian produk dari product.template.
1. Mengimpor ke product.product otomatis membuat product.template jika belum ada
2. Untuk produk dengan varian, impor ke product.template terlebih dahulu,
   kemudian impor varian ke product.product dengan mereferensikan template
3. Field product_tmpl_id digunakan untuk mereferensikan template
4. Atribut varian didefinisikan melalui field attribute_value_ids

fields.name: accessory_product_ids
fields.help: Accessories show up when the customer reviews the cart before payment (cross-sell strategy).

fields.name: active
fields.help: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.

fields.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

fields.name: activity_exception_icon
fields.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

fields.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

fields.help: Font awesome icon e.g. fa-tasks

fields.name: allow_negative_stock
fields.help: If this option is not active on this product nor on its product category and that this product is a stockable product, then the validation of the related stock moves will be blocked if the stock level becomes negative with the stock move.

fields.name: alternative_product_ids
fields.help: Suggest alternatives to your customer (upsell strategy). Those products show up on the product page.

fields.name: can_be_expensed
fields.help: Specify whether the product can be selected in an expense.

fields.name: categ_id
fields.help: Select category for the current product

fields.name: cost_method
fields.help:
Standard Price: The products are valued at their standard cost defined on the product.
        Average Cost (AVCO): The products are valued at weighted average cost.
        First In First Out (FIFO): The products are valued supposing those that enter the company first will also leave it first.

fields.name: description_sale
fields.help: A description of the Product that you want to communicate to your customers. This description will be copied to every Sales Order, Delivery Order and Customer Invoice/Credit Note

fields.name: expense_policy
fields.help: Expenses and vendor bills can be re-invoiced to a customer.With this option, a validated expense can be re-invoice to a customer at its cost or sales price.

fields.name: has_available_route_ids
fields.field_description: Routes can be selected on this product
fields.string: Routes can be selected on this product

fields.name: hs_code
fields.help: Standardized code for international shipping and goods declaration. At the moment, only used for the FedEx shipping provider.

fields.name: inventory_availability
fields.help: Adds an inventory availability status on the web product page.
selection: Show inventory on website and prevent sales if not enough stock
Show inventory below a threshold and prevent sales if not enough stock

fields.name: invoice_policy
fields.help:
Ordered Quantity: Invoice quantities ordered by the customer.
Delivered Quantity: Invoice quantities delivered to the customer.

fields.name: list_price
fields.help: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

fields.name: lst_price
fields.help: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

fields.name: message_has_error
fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

fields.name: message_has_error_counter
fields.help: Number of messages with delivery error

fields.name: message_has_sms_error
fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

fields.name: message_needaction
fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

fields.name: message_needaction_counter
fields.help: Number of messages which requires an action

fields.name: message_unread
fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

fields.name: message_unread_counter
fields.help: Number of unread messages

fields.name: packaging_ids
fields.help: Gives the different ways to package the same product.

fields.name: pricelist_id
fields.help: Technical field. Used for searching on pricelists, not stored in database.

fields.name: produce_delay
fields.help: Average lead time in days to manufacture this product. In the case of multi-level BOM, the manufacturing lead times of the components will be added.

fields.name: project_id
fields.help: Select a billable project on which tasks can be created. This setting must be set for each company.

fields.name: project_template_id
fields.help: Select a billable project to be the skeleton of the new created project when selling the current product. Its stages and tasks will be duplicated.

fields.name: property_account_creditor_price_difference
fields.help: This account is used in automated inventory valuation to record the price difference between a purchase order and its related vendor bill when validating this vendor bill.

fields.name: property_account_expense_id
fields.help: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category. If anglo-saxon accounting with automated valuation method is configured, the expense account on the product category will be used.

fields.name: property_account_income_id
fields.help: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category.

fields.name: property_stock_inventory
fields.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated when you do an inventory.

fields.name: property_stock_production
fields.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated by manufacturing orders.

fields.name: public_categ_ids
fields.help: The product will be available in each mentioned eCommerce category. Go to Shop > Customize and enable 'eCommerce categories' to view all eCommerce categories.

fields.name: purchase_line_warn
fields.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

fields.name: purchase_method
fields.help:
On ordered quantities: Control bills based on ordered quantities.
On received quantities: Control bills based on received quantities.

fields.name: purchase_requisition
fields.help: Create a draft purchase order: Based on your product configuration, the system will create a draft purchase order.Propose a call for tender : If the 'purchase_requisition' module is installed and this option is selected, the system will create a draft call for tender.

fields.name: rating_last_feedback
fields.help: Reason of the rating

fields.name: recurring_invoice
fields.help: If set, confirming a sale order with this product will create a subscription

fields.name: responsible_id
fields.help: This user will be responsible of the next activities related to logistic operations for this product.

fields.name: route_ids
fields.help: Depending on the modules installed, this will allow you to define the route of the product: whether it will be bought, manufactured, replenished on order, etc.

fields.name: sale_delay
fields.help: Delivery lead time, in days. It's the number of days, promised to the customer, between the confirmation of the sales order and the delivery.

fields.name: sale_line_warn
fields.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

fields.name: seller_ids
fields.help: Define vendor pricelists.

fields.name: sequence
fields.help: Gives the sequence order when displaying a product list

fields.name: service_to_purchase
fields.help: If ticked, each time you sell this product through a SO, a RfQ is automatically created to buy the product. Tip: don't forget to set a vendor on the product.

fields.name: service_tracking
fields.help:
On Sales order confirmation, this product can generate a project and/or task.         From those, you can track the service you are selling.
         'In sale order's project': Will use the sale order's configured project if defined or fallback to         creating a new project based on the selected template.
selection: Create a task in an existing project
Create a task in sales order's project
Create a new project but no task

fields.name: service_type
fields.help:
Manually set quantities on order: Invoice based on the manually entered quantity, without creating an analytic account.
Timesheets on contract: Invoice based on the tracked hours on the related timesheet.
Create a task and track hours: Create a task on the sales order validation and track the work hours.
selection: Timesheets on project (one fare per SO/Project)

fields.name: show_on_hand_qty_status_button
fields.field_description: Show On Hand Qty Status Button
fields.string: Show On Hand Qty Status Button

fields.name: standard_price
fields.help:
In Standard Price & AVCO: value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        In FIFO: value of the next unit that will leave the stock (automatically computed).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.

fields.name: subscription_template_id
fields.help: Product will be included in a selected template

fields.name: supplier_taxes_id
fields.help: Default taxes used when buying the product.

fields.name: taxes_id
fields.help: Default taxes used when selling the product.

fields.name: tracking
fields.help: Ensure the traceability of a storable product in your warehouse.

fields.name: type
fields.help:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

fields.name: uom_id
fields.help: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.

fields.name: uom_po_id
fields.help: Default unit of measure used for purchase orders. It must be in the same category as the default unit of measure.

fields.help:

fields.name: consumption
fields.help:
Defines if you can consume more or less components than the quantity defined on the BoM:
  * Allowed: allowed for all manufacturing users.
  * Allowed with warning: allowed for all manufacturing users with summary of consumption differences when closing the manufacturing order.
  * Blocked: only a manager can close a manufacturing order when the BoM consumption is not respected.

special_rules.bom_lines_import:
Saat mengimpor BoM, komponen dapat didefinisikan dengan dua cara:
1. Membuat record mrp.bom.line terpisah terlebih dahulu
2. Menggunakan field 'bom_line_ids' atau kolom dengan format khusus di spreadsheet import
   yang akan otomatis membuat record mrp.bom.line berdasarkan produk
3. Format bom_line_ids: (0, 0, {'product_id': id, 'product_qty': qty})
4. Saat melakukan import via CSV/XLS, product_id bisa berupa nama produk
   dan Odoo akan mencari produk dengan nama tersebut

constraints.name: mrp_bom_line_bom_qty_zero

Lines with 0 quantities can be used as optional lines. 
You should install the mrp_byproduct module if you want to manage extra products on BoMs !

fields.help: This is a name that helps you keep track of your different campaign efforts, e.g. Fall_Drive, Christmas_Special

fields.help: Fill this field if you plan to invoice the shipping based on picking.

fields.name: commission_ids
fields.help: Sale Commission related to this order(based on sales person)

fields.name: commitment_date
fields.help: This is the delivery date promised to the customer. If set, the delivery order will be scheduled based on this date rather than product lead times.

fields.help: Date on which sales order is created.

fields.name: currency_rate
fields.help: The rate of the currency to the currency of rate 1 applicable at the date of the order

fields.name: date_order
fields.help:
Creation date of draft/sent orders,
Confirmation date of confirmed orders.

fields.name: effective_date
fields.help: Completion date of the first delivery order.

fields.name: expected_date
fields.help: Delivery date you can promise to the customer, computed from the minimum lead time of the order lines in case of Service products. In case of shipping, the shipping policy of the order will be taken into account to either use the minimum or maximum lead time of the order lines.

fields.name: fiscal_position_id
fields.help: Fiscal positions are used to adapt taxes and accounts for particular customers or sales orders/invoices.The default value comes from the customer.

fields.name: incoterm
fields.help: International Commercial Terms are a series of predefined commercial terms used in international transactions.

fields.help: If you deliver all products at once, the delivery order will be scheduled based on the greatest product lead time. Otherwise, it will be based on the shortest.

 this will then display a recomputation button

Creation: The Sales Order created the subscription
Upselling: The Sales Order added lines to the subscription
Renewal: The Sales Order replaced the subscription's content with its own

fields.name: timesheet_encode_uom_id
fields.help:
This will set the unit of measure used to encode timesheet. This will simply provide tools
        and widgets to help the encoding. All reporting will still be expressed in hours (default value).

fields.name: timesheet_ids
fields.field_description: Timesheet activities associated to this sale
fields.string: Timesheet activities associated to this sale

fields.name: timesheet_total_duration
fields.help: Total recorded duration, expressed in the encoding UoM, and rounded to the unit

fields.name: website_id
fields.help: Website through which this order was placed.

fields.name: website_message_ids
fields.help: Website communication history

fields.name: website_order_line
fields.help: Order Lines to be displayed on the website. They should not be used for computation purpose.

relationships.field_description: Timesheet activities associated to this sale

constraints.name: sale_order_date_order_conditional_required
constraints.message: A confirmed sales order requires a confirmation date.

required_fields.name: pricelist_id
required_fields.help: If you change the pricelist, only newly added lines will be affected.

computed_fields.name: access_url
computed_fields.help: Customer Portal URL

computed_fields.name: activity_exception_decoration
computed_fields.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

computed_fields.name: activity_exception_icon
computed_fields.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

computed_fields.name: activity_state
computed_fields.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

computed_fields.name: activity_type_icon
computed_fields.help: Font awesome icon e.g. fa-tasks

computed_fields.name: amount_by_group
computed_fields.help: type: [(name, amount, base, formated amount, formated base)]

computed_fields.name: amount_delivery
computed_fields.help: The amount without tax.

computed_fields.name: currency_rate
computed_fields.help: The rate of the currency to the currency of rate 1 applicable at the date of the order

computed_fields.name: date_order
computed_fields.help:
Creation date of draft/sent orders,
Confirmation date of confirmed orders.

computed_fields.name: effective_date
computed_fields.help: Completion date of the first delivery order.

computed_fields.name: expected_date
computed_fields.help: Delivery date you can promise to the customer, computed from the minimum lead time of the order lines in case of Service products. In case of shipping, the shipping policy of the order will be taken into account to either use the minimum or maximum lead time of the order lines.

computed_fields.name: json_popover
computed_fields.description: JSON data for the popover widget

computed_fields.name: message_has_error
computed_fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

computed_fields.name: message_has_error_counter
computed_fields.help: Number of messages with delivery error

computed_fields.name: message_has_sms_error
computed_fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

computed_fields.name: message_needaction
computed_fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

computed_fields.name: message_needaction_counter
computed_fields.help: Number of messages which requires an action

computed_fields.name: message_unread
computed_fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

computed_fields.name: message_unread_counter
computed_fields.help: Number of unread messages

computed_fields.name: picking_policy
computed_fields.help: If you deliver all products at once, the delivery order will be scheduled based on the greatest product lead time. Otherwise, it will be based on the shortest.

computed_fields.name: promo_code
computed_fields.help: Applied program code

computed_fields.name: require_payment
computed_fields.help: Request an online payment to the customer in order to confirm orders automatically.

computed_fields.name: require_signature
computed_fields.help: Request a online signature to the customer in order to confirm orders automatically.

computed_fields.name: timesheet_total_duration
computed_fields.help: Total recorded duration, expressed in the encoding UoM, and rounded to the unit

relation_fields.name: analytic_account_id
relation_fields.help: The analytic account related to a sales order.

relation_fields.name: campaign_id
relation_fields.help: This is a name that helps you keep track of your different campaign efforts, e.g. Fall_Drive, Christmas_Special

relation_fields.name: carrier_id
relation_fields.help: Fill this field if you plan to invoice the shipping based on picking.

relation_fields.name: commission_ids
relation_fields.help: Sale Commission related to this order(based on sales person)

relation_fields.name: fiscal_position_id
relation_fields.help: Fiscal positions are used to adapt taxes and accounts for particular customers or sales orders/invoices.The default value comes from the customer.

relation_fields.name: incoterm
relation_fields.help: International Commercial Terms are a series of predefined commercial terms used in international transactions.

relation_fields.name: medium_id
relation_fields.help: This is the method of delivery, e.g. Postcard, Email, or Banner Ad

relation_fields.name: pricelist_id
relation_fields.help: If you change the pricelist, only newly added lines will be affected.

relation_fields.name: project_id
relation_fields.help: Select a non billable project on which tasks can be created.

relation_fields.name: project_ids
relation_fields.help: Projects used in this sales order.

relation_fields.name: source_id
relation_fields.help: This is the source of the link, e.g. Search Engine, another domain, or name of email list

relation_fields.name: timesheet_encode_uom_id
relation_fields.help:
This will set the unit of measure used to encode timesheet. This will simply provide tools
        and widgets to help the encoding. All reporting will still be expressed in hours (default value).

relation_fields.description: Timesheet activities associated to this sale

relation_fields.help: Website through which this order was placed.

relation_fields.name: website_message_ids
relation_fields.help: Website communication history

relation_fields.name: website_order_line
relation_fields.help: Order Lines to be displayed on the website. They should not be used for computation purpose.

special_rules.order_lines_import:
Saat mengimpor Sales Order, baris pesanan dapat didefinisikan dengan dua cara:
1. Membuat record sale.order.line terpisah terlebih dahulu
2. Menggunakan field 'order_line' atau kolom dengan format khusus di spreadsheet import
   yang akan otomatis membuat record sale.order.line
3. Format order_line: (0, 0, {'product_id': id, 'product_uom_qty': qty, 'price_unit': price})
4. Saat melakukan import via CSV/XLS, product_id bisa berupa nama produk
   dan Odoo akan mencari produk dengan nama tersebut

fields.name: customer_lead
fields.help: Number of days between the order confirmation and the shipping of the products to the customer

fields.name: display_type
fields.help: Technical field for UX purpose.

fields.name: is_downpayment
fields.help: Down payments are made when creating invoices from a sales order. They are not copied when duplicating a sales order.

fields.name: is_expense
fields.help: Is true if the sales order line comes from an expense or a vendor bills

fields.name: is_service
fields.help: Sales Order item should generate a task and/or a project, depending on the product settings.

fields.name: product_type
fields.help:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

fields.name: product_uom_category_id
fields.help: Conversion between Units of Measure can only occur if they belong to the same category. The conversion will be made based on the ratios.

fields.name: project_id
fields.help: Project generated by the sales order item

fields.name: purchase_line_ids
fields.help: Purchase line generated by this Sales item on order confirmation, or when the quantity was increased.

fields.name: qty_delivered_method
fields.help:
According to product configuration, the delivered quantity can be automatically computed by mechanism :
  - Manual: the quantity is set manually on the line
  - Analytic From expenses: the quantity is the quantity sum from posted expenses
  - Timesheet: the quantity is the sum of hours recorded on tasks linked to this sale line
  - Stock Moves: the quantity comes from confirmed pickings

fields.name: task_id
fields.help: Task generated by the sales order item

constraints.name: sale_order_line_accountable_required_fields
constraints.message: Missing required fields on accountable sale order line.

constraints.name: sale_order_line_non_accountable_null_fields
constraints.message: Forbidden values on non-accountable sale order line
